definition[0]: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird
example[0]: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
example[1]: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
example[3]: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape (=back) of her neck.
example[4]: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff (=back) of the neck into the house.
example[5]: Jean wore a string of pearls around her neck.
definition[1]: the part of a piece of clothing that goes around your neck
example[6]: The sweater has a round neck and long sleeves.
example[8]: The neck of his shirt was open.
definition[2]: the narrow part of something, usually at the top
example[9]: a crack in the neck of the violin
example[10]: Lara put the cork back in the neck of the bottle.
definition[3]: a confident attitude that makes you able to do unreasonable or shocking things without feeling embarrassed
example[11]: I don't know how they have the neck to charge that much!
definition[4]: a narrow piece of land that comes out of a wider part
example[12]: a neck of land between a lake and the sea
definition[5]: if two people are necking, they kiss for a long time in a sexual way
